summary: THE SEAT BELT ON MY 2000 JEEP CHEROKEE HAS COME UNINTENTIONALLY UNLATCHED 2 TIMES WITHIN THE 2 MONTHS I HAVE OWNED THE VEHICLE.  ONCE AS I WAS TRAVELING ABOUT 25 MPH I WAS FORCED TO SLAMMED ON THE BRAKES TO AVOID HITTING A CHILD WHO RAN INTO THE STREET.  THE SECOND TIME OCCURRED AS I WAS TRAVELING OVER A ROAD UNDER REPAIR.  I HIT A LARGE POTHOLE, BOUNCED AND AS I CAME BACK DOWN, THE SEAT BELT UNBUCKLED.   *NLM
